item.description: This class meets once per month and is designed for the spiritual seeker who is looking to deepen their experience of peace and joy through the practice of meditation. Each class will have two components. We will start the class with a guided meditation, followed by some discussion about our experience and how to deepen our meditation practice. Next we will look at a reading from the sacred text of one of the world religions and talk about how it applies to us today as we seek to deepen in our personal experience of God inside ourselves.

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: class: Meditation for the Modern-Day Mystic
